title: High Interest Payments as a Share of Revenue
description: In 2023, Sri Lanka's interest payments accounted for 79.87% of its total revenue, indicating a significant financial burden on the country's budget.

title: Significant Interest Payments Relative to Expenses
description: Sri Lanka's interest payments made up 49.44% of its total expenses in 2023, highlighting a substantial portion of government spending directed towards debt servicing.

title: Impressive Exclusive Breastfeeding Rates
description: In 2016, 80.93% of Sri Lankan children under six months were exclusively breastfed, showcasing the country's strong commitment to early childhood nutrition.

title: Low Prevalence of Overweight Children
description: By 2024, only 0.5% of children under five in Sri Lanka were classified as overweight, reflecting effective public health measures in child nutrition.

title: Significant Decline in Equity Indices
description: In 2022, Sri Lanka experienced a steep decline in its S&P Global Equity Indices, with a decrease of 62.44%, indicating economic challenges.
